Static Public Member Functions

static XINXStaticDeleter * self ()

Detailed Description

All static class add self to the static deleter who delete all static class when the application is stopped (if necessary).

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

void XINXStaticDeleter::addObject ( QObject *  object  )  [inline]

Deprecated:
Add an object to the static deleter class. This function is replaced by the add() method of the QObjectCleanupHandler.

Retrieve the global object created at the first call of the this method.
